name: Erl
description:
A short game about a big journey

A beautyfull experience full of hand animated characters.

You will find yourself in the swamps of arrival, walk through the spheres of philosophy and party with the gods.

Use headphones for an optimal experience.

Special thanks to those awesome musicans who let me use their wonderful music:

Okolo - No Peace Feat Mo Prod By Jay 808 Beats (https://soundcloud.com/odinaka-okolo/no-peace)

Smite - Techno for the Gods (link will follow soon)

Also a big thank you to everytexture.com

Feel free to leave a tip to support upcoming Games.
